channel.title: Comments on: Resilience Factor Three: Understanding and Expressing Yourself.
channel.description: Strategies to recover from stress quickly

item.title: By: Jerry Sheridan
item.dc:creator: Jerry Sheridan
item.description:
to klevens1 Thank you for your kind comment. When we decided to start this blog, I thought it would be much more interactive, including helpful tips from us and other readers. instead we were flooded with spam. Temporarily we had to shut down comments. I think we have that problem solved now.
I really appreciate your comment. The central purpose of the blog is to make a difference in the lives of readers, and hearing from people like you is encouraging.
Best wishes,
Jerry Sheridan
item.content:encoded:
to klevens1
Thank you for your kind comment. When we decided to start this blog, I thought it would be much more interactive, including helpful tips from us and other readers. instead we were flooded with spam. Temporarily we had to shut down comments. I think we have that problem solved now.

I really appreciate your comment. The central purpose of the blog is to make a difference in the lives of readers, and hearing from people like you is encouraging.

Best wishes,

Jerry Sheridan

item.title: By: Kate Levens
item.dc:creator: Kate Levens
item.description:
Dr. Sheridan and Debbie,
Your site has been beneficial for me several times. I have given this address to many of my friends and they like it also. Thank you for your thorough and well I cannot think of the word right now, ease to read and understand, posts. The availability to past posts is also great.
Sincerely,
Katy
item.content:encoded:
